name: a picnic under the stars
description:
Bun and Kat are supposed to meet up for a date when Bun runs into some trouble. Help this bunny have a successful date!

Controls: 

w a s d or arrow keys to move

Credits:

  • Made with Bitsy HD hack by Fred Bednarski (original version by Adam Le Doux).
  • Music: www.bensound.com

This is my first game, I hope you enjoy it! <3
